name: Eevy's Simulation Room
description:
There are 3 different scenarios to choose from all with objectives to finish. things can get randomly hectic so you also get replay value. come try it. #indiedev #indiegame #IndieGameDev #indiegames #gamedev #gamedevelopment #gamedesign #gamedeveloper #UE4

Eevy's Simulation Room is a different installment of the main project Lytta-N1:TEP. See it as alternative DLC. The purpose is to make faster unrelated content for streamers/ytubers
